title: Screen and/or Gboard issues. Swiping words sometimes goes berserk?
content:
I've had this issue since day 1 with my Pixel 3a XL and can't find any info about it. Not sure if it's the screen or the Gboard but I have a feeling it's the latter.

Every once in a while, but not always, while swipe-typing words via Gboard, it goes berserk and starts just adding tons of 1- and 2- and 3-latter gibberish words as I swipe, even when not lifting my finger. It probably happens about 3-5 times a day.

I thought maybe it was Gboard but have tried all the suggestions about force-quitting Gboard etc. but to no avail.

I also think it might be the screen itself because sometimes I play a mini golf game where you pull back from the ball and release to indicate force, and the ball just (sometimes) releases when I'm in the middle of pulling back.

I don't think it's a "dead zone" on the screen because it's very intermittent. But maybe related? Has ANYONE else experienced something similar and is it a 3a XL issue? Or a Gboard issue? Or something bigger OR is it maybe an isolated defect in my hardware?

Thank you!
